testcaseName: Patient is 8 years of age and has been administered the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine as first and second dose and Janssen Covid-19 vaccine as a booster dose
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

administeredDoses.evaluationReason: Not a preferable or allowable vaccine

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient that is 8 years of age has been administered Janssen Covid19 vaccine as a third dose, that the dose is not valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: v4.28 Updated the test cased based on new updated Interim Clinical Considerations for a new COVID-19 booster recommendation for people ages 5 years and older to receive 1 bivalent MRNA booster dose, at least 2 months, after completion of a monovalent primary series; these recommendations replace all booster recommendations for this age group.
